sen.j: 下鴨西通（しもがもにしどおり）は京都市左京区の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Shimogamo-nishi-doori street is one of the streets running from north to south in Sakyo Ward in Kyoto City.
Shimogamo-nishi-doori street is a street running north-south in Sakyo Ward in Kyoto City.
Shimogamo Nishi-dori Street is a street running north-south in Sakyo Ward in Kyoto City.

sen.j: 鴨川 (淀川水系)の東岸を葵橋東詰の下鴨本通から北へ京都府立植物園正門まで。
sen.e: Shimogamo-nishi-doori street runs northward on the east bank of Kamo River (in Yodo river system) from the east end of Aoi-bashi bridge on Shimogamo-hondoori street to the front gate of Kyoto Prefectural Botanical Garden.

Shimogamo-nishi-doori street runs northward on the east bank of Kamo River (in Yodo river system) from the east end of Aoi-bashi bridge on Shimogamo-hondoori street to the front gate of Kyoto Prefectural Botanical Garden.

Shimogamo Nishi-dori Street runs northward on the east bank of the Kamo-gawa River (in Yodo-gawa River system) from the east end of Aoi-bashi Bridge on Shimogamo Hon-dori Street to the front gate of Kyoto Prefectural Botanical Garden.
sen.cmt: Shimogamo Nishi-dori Street, Kamo-gawa River, Yodo-gawa River, Aoi-bashi Bridge, Shimogamo Hon-dori Streetとしました。"Kamo-gawa River"→"the Kamo-gawa River"に変更しました。

sen.j: 一筋東の下鴨中通の北大路通から御蔭通と異なり、対面通行可能である。
sen.e: Walking facing the traffic is allowed on Shimogamo-nishi-doori street being different from the section from a point on Kitaoji-doori street to a point on Mikage-doori street of Shimogamo-naka-doori street which is located by one street in the east of Shimogamo-nishi-doori street.

Walking towards incoming traffic is allowed on Shimogamo-nishi-doori street as opposed to the section from a point on Kitaoji-doori street to a point on Mikage-doori street of Shimogamo-naka-doori street which is located one street east of Shimogamo-nishi-doori street.

Walking towards incoming traffic is allowed on Shimogamo Nishi-dori Street as opposed to the section from a point on Kitaoji-dori Street to a point on Mikage-dori Street of Shimogamo Naka-dori Street which is located one street east of Shimogamo Nishi-dori Street.
sen.cmt: ○○通の表記をすべて"-dori Street"に修正、Shimogamo-nishi-doori→Shimogamo Nishi-dori、Shimogamo-naka-doori→Shimogamo Naka-doriとしました。

sen.j: 沿道は住宅街で、京都財界の著名人が居を構えたこともあった。
sen.e: The area along Shimogamo-nishi-doori street is a residential area and some celebrities in the business and financial world of Kyoto used to live there.
The area along Shimogamo-nishi-doori street is a residential area and some celebrities in the business and financial world of Kyoto used to live there.
The area along Shimogamo Nishi-dori Street is a residential area and some celebrities in the business and financial world of Kyoto used to live there.
Main facilities along Shimogamo-nishi-doori street
Main facilities along Shimogamo-nishi-doori street
Main Facilities along Shimogamo Nishi-dorii Street
sen.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に変更、Shimogamo Nishi-dori Streetとしました。

sen.j: 京都家庭裁判所 葵橋東詰
sen.e: The Kyoto Family Court at east end of Aoi Bridge
The Kyoto Family Court at the east end of Aoi Bridge
The Kyoto Family Court at the east end of Aoi-bashi Bridge
